resources.string: Could not find any log files!

Press the start button to begin logging. You will then have to select an activity you will perform. Once you chose one you should put your phone into your pocket - upside down with the screen facing your thigh . You got 10 seconds to do so. Once the 10 seconds have passed your phone will log all sensor values to a file. If you want to change your activity you may take the phone out of your pocket and turn the screen back on. Once you selected a new activity you should put your back into your pocket - again you have ten seconds to so in order to avoid distorting the logged data.
The generated files will be stored on your phone locally. Switch to the "Sessions"-view to get an overview of the stored data. From there you are also able to send the files to someone per email.
